Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard

Class ScoreboardNumericDisplay<P>

java.lang.Object
net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard.ScoreboardNumericDisplay<P>
Type Parameters:
P -
@AvailableSince("0.0.41") public abstract class ScoreboardNumericDisplay<P> extends Object
Represents a numeric display in game scoreboard (hearts / score)
